tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: David Letterman - Michelle Obama's Joining Forces Update
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: The First Lady details the progress made by her initiative to help veterans find work.

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: So you mean that it's the responsible thing to do to pull out of a war overnight -a war that was started illegally by America in the first place, mind﻿ you- leaving hundreds of thousands of civilians to die without the bare necessities in a country destroyed by the war? Yeah, that's what a responsible President would do. Ron Paul is an extremely intelligent man, and I'm sure he knows you cannot do something like that.

Dear Mrs Michelle Obama after Barack finishes another four years would you consider running for﻿ presidency yourself? Americans and the world need top notch leadership to help pay off the debt and lead Americans to enjoy better lives. In the meantime I will continue to encourage people to fight to give President Obama another four years to clean up USA :-)

Most of that money is not﻿ coming back to us you idiot! How in the hell is all the money spent on missals and ammunition going to contribute our economy. It goes straight to the military manufactures and it leaves broken cities that receive our foreign aid. What a dumb ass you are. You just want to see people die and let the govt take my money and spend it on a undeclared war.

Yes he can, his the head of the executive branch. Republicans or democrats cant do a dang thing over the control of military if they aren't the Chief of executive branch, its in the constitution. Ron Paul was going to do it LITERALLY OVERNIGHT if he would of been the president in 08 or have the chance to﻿ win 2012 election. Obama is just a sell out, does what he is told. And now explain to me why he cant pull out of a war overnight? I would really like to hear your answer.
You can't pull out of a﻿ war overnight. And even if he could do that, Republican obstructionism would keep on preventing him to do so.

yes it is a responsible thing. What? Do you want us to kill more innocent civilians? Cause that is what were doing. We started the mess and you still want to continue the war? your a dumb ass. Ron Paul said himself many times and you can see all his interviews that he would of bring all the troops home as quick as the ships could bring them and not just from the middle east. The reason all this civilians have bare necessities is due to us interfering with them and you still want us﻿ to interferer
Yes,﻿ and that's what he is trying to do.

lol you obviously don't understand economics or common math since you seem to think leaders like her would be paying﻿ off the debt. An increase of $6 trillion(Obama's term) on debt is no way paying off the debt lol
are you really that that stupid, or was﻿ that a really bad joke??

And anyway, even Ron Paul couldn't have done it. They wouldn't have let him. America spent billions of dollars on the war, but trust me, some of that money will have to come back one way﻿ or another. Just like when the US helped the countries destroyed by WWII. I'm Italian, I know we're still paying that debt and it's a long, long way to go until it's cleared. And it's been what, almost 70 years? Wars are not just a matter of peace and justice anymore, it's mostly about the money.

Reviewer.Music: EMINEM, SLIM SHADY, MARSHALL BRUCE MATHERS III
